text: The Middletown Guards were an American basketball team based in Middletown, Connecticut, that was a member of the American Basketball League. The team dropped out of the league on January 8, 1953. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |1952/53 |ABL |6th |Did not qualify |} ==References== Category:Middletown, Connecticut Category:American Basketball League (1925–1955) teams Category:Basketball teams established in 1952 Category:Basketball teams disestablished in 1953
title: Middletown Guards
